Annotation ID.description: The unique ID of the annotation

Image ID.description: The ID of the image to which the annotation applies (linked to Image schema)

Motivation.description: The purpose of the annotation, following IIIF standard motivations

Source.description: The URL or identifier of the image being annotated (e.g., IIIF image)

type.description: The type of selector being used (e.g., FragmentSelector, SvgSelector, or PointSelector)

value.description: The region or point of the image being annotated

type.description: The type of body, usually textual but can also be an image, video, or sound

value.description: The content of the annotation (e.g., a comment or tag)

format.description: The format of the body, such as text/plain or image/jpeg

language.description: The language of the text, if applicable

Created.description: The date and time when the annotation was created

Modified.description: The date and time when the annotation was last modified

Creator.description: The ID of the person or system that created the annotation
